page.title: 18PRESTWICH CARNIVAL
page.content: On the third Saturday in June, the people of {Prestwich}line the streets to watch the {Annual Carnival}.Brass bands, dancing troupes, floats, depicting many scenes and crammed with children in fancy dress,and carnival queens in beautiful dresses and riding on gaily decorated cars wend their way through{Prestwich}. The procession finally arrives at {St.Mary's Park},where the newly elected {Carnival Queen}is crowned and begins her year of office. It is a very colourful{ceremony}with children carrying out the duties of pages and queen's attendants.Swings,roundabouts and side-shows are a great attraction. Lots of money is collected which is then given to local charities. Our Lady of Grace Primary School.
